title: Frodo's Cloak (4R303)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Possession â€¢ Cloak
Game Text:	Bearer must be Frodo. Skirmish: At sites 1T to 4T, add a burden and discard this possession to cancel a skirmish involving Frodo. At any other site, discard this possession to remove a burden and heal Frodo.
Lore:	Neither weather nor searching eyes found Frodo.
Rarity:	R
